name: GMSOL
description: $GMSOL is a memecoin that spreads positivity in the world by donating to community chosen charities and rewarding holders. Holders of $GMSOL are eligible for a reoccurring lottery airdrop. Each airdrop winner will receive a substantial amount of $GMSOL as well as choose a charity of their choice to donate the an equal amount of $GMSOL to. the exact amount of $GMSOL will be on a varying basis depending on the price. inspired by the mechanics and game theory of OlympusDAO (OHM), we designed a mechanic that incentives everyone to buy $GMSOL and hold (ðŸ’œ,ðŸ’œ) . Holders of $GMSOL get upside with chances at airdop, and being part of a community that contributes to charitable causes. LPs get staking rewards and will also be eligible for the lottery a bonus multiplier.
